definitions.text: someone who is or has been segregated
separate by race or religion; practice a policy of racial segregation
examples: We don't segregate in this county

definitions.text: divide from the main body or mass and collect
examples: Many towns segregated into new counties
Experiments show clearly that genes segregate

definitions.text: separate or isolate (one thing) from another and place in a group apart from others
examples: large mining claims are segregated into smaller claims
